column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When we first arrived to Chicago
column2: first thing we want to try is a deep dish pizza and I'm glad we chose Lou Malnati's Pizzeria for that! We ordered a medium size The Malnati's Chicago Classic deep dish pizza
column4: and a family styled ceaser salad with grilled chicken. I'm not a big fan of pizza and I thought this deep dish pizza will blow my mind because there's so much good reviews about this deep dish pizza and I expect it to be
